section.heading: Prohibition on Capital Funds for Operating Expenses.
section.text: The Mayor shall not expend any moneys borrowed for capital projects for operating expenses of the District of Columbia government.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2(b) of the Redevelopment Land Agency Disposition Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-563, January 31, 2001, 48 DCR 1625).
For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 4(d) of the Redevelopment Land Agency Disposition Review Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-524, January 11, 2001, 48 DCR 624).
